module.name: derived_shape_element
module.purpose: This part of ISO 10303 specifies an application module for the representation of shape elements that are derived from other shape elements.
module.inscope: Shape_elements that depend for their definition on the definition of one or more other shape elements.

uof.name: Derived_Shape_Element
uof.description: The Derived_Shape_Element UoF specifies the data structure for specifying a shape element that is derived from another shape element.
